Text:
Sorry, had connection problems last night. seeding now.

niggapoison, you and everybody else were stuck at 97%, so it is not possible for you to determine if it works.

File successfully downloaded, and ghost2/profile2 folders copied where they have to be.
New profile appears in profile list, but get message "profile cannot be loaded" when I select it. My other profiles are OK.
PS. I work offline with update 1 and skidrow patch installed.
alibaba2010, you are just an idiot, no response necessary.

Baudouin, This was made without update 1 maybe that's the problem. The brand of patch should not be an issue.

I'm downloading the update now, I'll install the update this week and test it myself.

Baudouin, I have just done a fresh install of the game and applied this update 1.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6440459

Both my own personal profile and this John Doe work ok. Sorry it didn't work for you but I cannot duplicate the problem.
